entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @replouiegohmert This old Frenchman is losing his mind . Be careful with Coronavirus because it has killed over 150,000 Americans Loui & you or someone you Infected could be next. Negligence like Louie not wearing a Mask derserves jail time or at the very Least he should be voted out of office.
